message: Let's start fair. You get 10% and I get 90%.  We can work from here.
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a slightly better deal. Your turn again!
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I need more than 600000 to make this worthwhile for me.  What do you think?
I'm willing to meet in the middle, but I think I can get a better deal. I'm offering a 50/50 split. What do you think?
